fr.iutvalence.m2107.p24.entities

Class Boss

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.iutvalence.m2107.p24.entities.Mob
      • fr.iutvalence.m2107.p24.entities.Boss

  • public class Boss
extends Mob
    Represent the boss of the game with all of his characteristics (health, damage, type, direction, ...).

    • Constructor Detail

      • Boss

        public Boss()
        Create a new boss, with its specific attributes. Unlike a classic boss, it has more life, and deals a lot more damage, according to its phase of combat. Its picture is different in each phase.
